title: Melissa McCarthy shows off slimmer figure on film set
text:
Melissa McCarthy shows off slimmer figure on film set Melissa McCarthy 
Melissa McCarthy is seen walking in Soho on June 3, 2015 in New York City. 
Melissa McCarthy is seen walking in Soho on June 3, 2015 in New York City. (Raymond Hall / GC Images) Kristen Bell 
Plainfield native Melissa McCarthy showed off a slimmer figure this week while working on the set of her upcoming movie "The Boss." 
McCarthy, 45, was photographed Monday on the Los Angeles set and she recently posted a picture of herself in costume on Instagram. McCarthy flaunted weight loss this summer on the red carpet for the premiere of her film "Spy." 
During a June appearance on "CBS This Morning," McCarthy joked that she was "crying off the pounds." 
In "The Boss," McCarthy plays Michelle Darnell, a self-help guru who spends time in prison for insider trading. McCarthy and co-star Kristen Bell filmed part of the movie in May at the Lakeview bar Matilda. 
McCarthy, who plays a Chicago teacher on the CBS show "Mike and Molly," is set to star in next year's reboot of "Ghostbusters." A photo posted by Melissa McCarthy (@melissamccarthy) on Sep 30, 2015 at 7:17pm PDT
